135944.en:
I recommend the sashimi of mushrooms stuck on the rocks or the stewed mouse. True, under the dark sky,
breathing in the poisonous air, watching the schools of flying fish swim by, and eating the stewed mouse!
Yikes! Hiccup. And if there's poison moss wine, it's the best! You should go eat a little too!

135945.en:
If you're poisoned, Moonlit Hall will cure you, but it won't help that you're hungry. I think I'll have
boiled rock moss today.

135946.en:
This is Moonlit Hall, the sacred place of Carlamora Village, and by nature, we cannot allow strangers in. But I
have heard about you from Sajay. That wounded girl must be an acquaintance of yours. Very well. Go in. The moon
will rise soon. She will be fine in no time.

135947.en:
This is Moonlit Hall, the sacred place of Carlamora Village, and by nature, we cannot allow strangers in. But I
have heard about you from Sajay. That wounded girl must be an acquaintance of yours. Very well. Go in. The moon
will rise soon. She will be fine in no time.

135948.en:
The priestess of the church, the fallen girl, the funny looking traveler, and suddenly we've got
visitors from elsewhere. Well, it's an ordinary village, but take your time. It's a bad place, full of poison, but
thanks to the moon, everyone is getting by.
135948.ja:

135949.en:
The other day, some funny guys from Astor Teiya or something like that came and took up residence in my
store. You're a very pale priest, aren't you? If you've been poisoned, why don't you go to Moonlit Hall and
bathe in the light of the moon for a bit?
135949.ja:

135950.en:
<pipipi_shigh>Oh, um. I can't open the door now
because my brother's not here. I'm
sorry.

135951.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I ran over my foot in the swamp when I
went to get some water. I think I'll
go worship the moon a little bit.

135952.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Sajay is not good. The forest is full
of poisons, so a child shouldn't go
out alone.

135953.en:
...Yeah. That's weird. It's totally
different from us. Why does it look
like this?

135955.en:
<turn_pc>Scary, scary! The weird-looking ones
should go away!

135956.en:
You were the traveler who brought the fallen woman with Sajay. This is Carlamora Village, and you are safe
inside. Your companion should be in Moonlit Hall. You will see a door up the hill from here. It's there.

135957.en: Hey, hey Puluka. This guy is...

135958.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>That's weird. Ah, I looked this way!
Scary!

135959.en:
Even with Moonlit Hall, it's like being poisoned on a daily basis, and not many people in the Dark Realm live
to see the end of their days. This house used to be home to another family, but many things happened. I
was given this house when it became vacant.
135959.ja:
ã€Œæµ„æœˆã®é–“ãŒã€€ã‚ã‚‹ã¨ã¯ã„ãˆ ã€€æ—¥ã€…ã€€æ¯’ã‚’æµ´ã³ã¦ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªã‚‚ã®ã ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€é—‡ã®é ˜ç•Œã®æ°‘ã§ã€€å¤©å¯¿ã‚’å…¨ã†ã™ã‚‹è€…ã¯å°‘ãªã„ã‚ˆã€‚

135960.en:
The sky is covered with rocks and this territory is closed, but strangely enough, outside the village, Zoomstone
can be used. However, the villages that once stood here and there are gone, and Carlamora Village is all
that remains. We have nowhere to go.

135961.en:
Ho! Hohoho! I see. The more I look at him, the stranger he looks. Where the hell did you guys come from? This is
Carlamora Village, the only place in the Dark Realm where people can live. You are lucky to have found it.
135961.ja:

135962.en:
This is Carlamora Village, the only place in the Dark Realm where people can live. You are lucky to have found
your way to this village. By the way, the more I look at you, the stranger you look. Where the hell did you come
from?
135962.ja:
ã€Œã“ã“ã¯ã€€ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ©ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ©æ‘ã€‚ ã€€é—‡ã®é ˜ç•Œã§ã€€å”¯ä¸€ã€€äººãŒç”Ÿãã¦ã„ã‘ã‚‹å ´æ‰€ã•ã€‚ ã€€ã“ã®æ‘ã«ã€€ãŸã©ã‚Šç€ã„ã¦ã€€å¹¸é‹ã ã£ãŸã­ã€‚

135963.en: The door is locked from the inside.

135965.en:
When we heard about the opening of the Dark Realm, the World Association of Innkeepers began dispatching people to
this area immediately. Rest assured that we will be waiting for you wherever you go as soon as the
territory opens!

135966.en:
We don't get many visitors. They have
a little bit of dust on them, but they
are all very nice. Now, let's see...<bw_break>

135967.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>That moon is the mercy of Nadraga, the
pure light that blots out all poisons.
Give thanks and go. Now...<bw_break>

135968.en:
For those who wish to change their vocation, even if their dorsal fins are poisoned, I will continue to
preach the teachings of God Dharma in this land. Now...

135969.en:
Even though any poison can be cured by
the moon, I still have to stay in bed
to rest, don't I? Well...<bw_break>

135970.en:
If it's the girl Sajay brought, it's Moonlit Hall. Hey, whatever poison you are exposed to, don't worry. There is
moonlight in this village.

135971.en:
This is the Moonlit Hall. All poisons will be dissipated in the holy of holies. The girl from the other races
is in the back here. The moon will rise soon. Then she will be well again.

135972.en:
Hey, stranger. I don't know what kind of lizard bone you are, but now that you're here, you better make sure
Sajay's safe. If you hurt my brother, you'll get me in trouble. Now, get the hell out of here. Go to Utopia,
wherever the hell you want!

135973.en:
Please leave Mr. Maille and everyone in the village to me and head to Utopia with Mr. Sajay. Please
be careful. May Nadraga's blessings be with that boy and on their way.
135973.ja:
ã€Œã•ã‚“ã€‚ãƒã‚¤ãƒ¦ã•ã‚“ã‚„ ã€€æ‘ã®çš†ã•ã‚“ã®ã“ã¨ã¯ã€€ç§ã«ã€€ã¾ã‹ã›ã¦ ã€€ã‚µã‚¸ã‚§ã•ã‚“ã¨ã€€æ¥½åœ’ã¸å‘ã‹ã£ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚
ã€Œã©ã†ã‹ã€€ãã‚Œãã‚Œã‚‚ã€€ãŠæ°—ã‚’ã¤ã‘ã¦â€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã®å°‘å¹´ã¨ã€€ã•ã‚“ã®è¡Œãé“ã« ã€€ãƒŠãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¬ç¥ã®ã”åŠ è­·ãŒã€€ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã‚ˆã†ã«â€¦â€¦ã€‚

135974.en:
I never thought the moon would be dropped by a monster. The people of the Dark Realm have been poisoned and
will have to wait for death.

135975.en:
At the top of the Dark Realm is Utopia, where the moon shines, and the light of the moon from beyond heals
all. So it is said from the olden times. The entrance to the Utopia to which Sajay was heading is in a rock
pit west-west of the village. But that door... It is called . If you are going after Sajay, tell him.
Do not set foot in Utopia.

135976.en:
Hey, you. I heard some really loud noises, but what the hell happened at Moonlit Hall? The moon was dropped by
a monster! Then what are we supposed to live on tomorrow?
135976.ja:
ã€ŒãŠã„ã€€ã‚ã‚“ãŸã€‚ ã€€ã™ã”ã„å¤§å£°ãŒã€€èã“ãˆã¦ããŸã‘ã© ã€€æµ„æœˆã®é–“ã§ã€€ã„ã£ãŸã„ã€€ä½•ãŒã‚ã£ãŸã‚“ã ï¼ï¼Ÿ
ã€Œã¤â€¦â€¦æœˆãŒã€€é­”ç‰©ã«è½ã¨ã•ã‚ŒãŸï¼ï¼Ÿ ã€€ãã‚Œã˜ã‚ƒã€€æ˜æ—¥ã‹ã‚‰ã€€ã‚ªãƒ¬ãŸã¡ã¯ ã€€ä½•ã‚’é ¼ã‚Šã«ã€€ç”Ÿãã¦ã„ã‘ã°ã„ã„ã‚“ã â€¦â€¦ã€‚

135977.en:
I can't believe the moon was dropped by a monster. Then, what should we rely on to live our lives from
tomorrow?

135978.en:
Sajay is the same age as me. She's alone, she knows things, and she's good at them. But she always looks
sad. So my brother asked Sajay to live with us, but Sajay won't come.

135979.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Sajay is such a naughty boy. I can't
go out by myself again. Baju will
chastise me later.

135980.en:
Yeah, I'll be watching Luluca. Luluca,
they might eat you.

135982.en:
Just now Sajay left the village with a very stern look on his face, saying he was going to the door to Utopia, which
is in the rock pit to the west. I wonder what happened. What? Please don't make bad jokes. The moon can't
fall. We can't live without it! That can't be true.
135982.ja:
ã€Œã•ã£ãã€€ã‚µã‚¸ã‚§ãŒã€€ã²ã©ãå³ã—ã„è¡¨æƒ…ã§ ã€€è¥¿ã®å²©ç©´ã«ã‚ã‚‹ã€€æ¥½åœ’ã¸ã®æ‰‰ã¸å‘ã‹ã†ã¨ã„ã£ã¦ ã€€æ‘ã‹ã‚‰å‡ºã¦ã„ã£ãŸã‚ã€‚ä½•ãŒã‚ã£ãŸã®ã‹ã—ã‚‰ã€‚
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ãˆã£ï¼Ÿã€€æ‚ªã„å†—è«‡ã¯ã€€ã‚„ã‚ã¦ã¡ã‚‡ã†ã ã„ã€‚ ã€€æœˆãŒè½ã¡ã‚‹ãªã‚“ã¦ã€€ã‚ã‚Šãˆãªã„ã‚ã€‚
ã€Œã ã£ã¦ã€€æœˆãŒãªã‹ã£ãŸã‚‰ ã€€ç§ãŸã¡ã¯ã€€ç”Ÿãã¦ã„ã‘ãªã„ã®ã‚ˆï¼ ã€€ãã‚“ãªã“ã¨ã€€ã‚ã‚‹ã¯ãšãªã„ã‚â€¦â€¦ã€‚

135983.en:
Hey, hey, Puluka. A strange-looking
guy came.

135984.en:
No, I'm not! I'm looking at Puluka! Puluka is the bad boy who nehat yesterday, that's why he came to eat
us!

135985.en:
<turn_pc>Scary, scary! Get away from me, you
weird-looking thing!

135986.en:
In the past, the dragon tribes of this realm were scattered here and there, but this Carlamora Village is the only
one that remains. But now that the moon has been lost, this village will soon perish as well.
135986.ja:
ã€Œã‹ã¤ã¦ã€€ã“ã®é ˜ç•Œã®ç«œæ—ã¯ã€€ã‚ã¡ã“ã¡ã« ã€€ã‚ã‹ã‚Œã¦ã€€æš®ã‚‰ã—ã¦ã„ãŸãã†ã§ã™ãŒ ã€€æ®‹ã£ãŸã®ã¯ã€€ã“ã®ã€€ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ©ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ©æ‘ã ã‘ã€‚
ã€Œã§ã™ãŒã€€æœˆãŒã€€å¤±ã‚ã‚ŒãŸä»¥ä¸Š ã€€ã“ã®æ‘ã‚‚ã€€é ã‹ã‚‰ãšã€€æ»…ã³å»ã‚‹ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†â€¦â€¦ã€‚

135987.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>If it is true that the moon fell, what
will happen to Carlamora Village?

135988.en: The door is locked from the inside.

135989.en:
If the moon, the pure light that dissolves all poisons, has been lost, then is there no longer any blessing
from God for us? Now...

135990.en:
Sajay didn't leave hastily. She knows the territory well enough to know that there must be some way to restore the
moon to its original state. But he's still a little boy. He's not strong enough to fight. Please, you have to
help Sajay.
135990.ja:
ã€Œã‚µã‚¸ã‚§ã¯ã€€ã‚„ã¿ãã‚‚ã«ã€€å‡ºç™ºã—ãŸã‚ã‘ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ã€‚ ã€€ã“ã®é ˜ç•Œã‚’ã€€çŸ¥ã‚Šå°½ãã—ã¦ã‚‹ã€€ã‚ã®å­ã«ã¯ ã€€ä½•ã‹ã—ã‚‰ã€€æœˆã‚’å…ƒã«æˆ»ã™ç®—æ®µãŒã€€ã‚ã‚‹ã‚“ã ã‚ã†ã€‚
ã€Œã ã‘ã©ã€€ã‚ã®å­ã¯ã€€ã¾ã å°ã•ã„â€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€æˆ¦ã†ãƒã‚«ãƒ©ã¯ã€€ã‹ã‚‰ã£ãã—ã ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã‚“ãŸã€€ã©ã†ã‹ã€€ã‚µã‚¸ã‚§ã‚’åŠ©ã‘ã¦ã‚„ã£ã¨ãã‚Œã‚ˆã€‚

135991.en:
What the hell is chief thinking? He's sending Sajay to Dark Vale. That place has been sealed off this whole time.
Both of you are fools to be led astray by the lore of Utopia. That's what happens when you rely on the moon all
the time!

135992.en:
What, the moon has fallen? I won't be deceived by such a lie even if I'm drunk. The moon is amazing. It's a
miracle. It can cure any kind of poison. Hiccup! Cheers to the moon!
135992.ja:
ã€Œãªã«ãƒã£ã€€æœˆãŒã€€è½ã¨ã•ã‚ŒãŸã ã¨ã‰ï¼ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã„ãã‚‰ã€€ä¿ºãŒã€€é…”ã£æ‰•ã£ã¦ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‰ã£ã¦ ã€€ãã‚“ãªã‚¦ã‚½ã«ã‚ƒã‚ã€€ã ã¾ã•ã‚Œã­ãˆãã€‚
ã€Œæœˆã¯ãªã‚ã€€ã™ã”ã„ã‚“ã ããƒ¼ã€‚å¥‡è·¡ãªã‚“ã ããƒ¼ã€‚ ã€€ã©ã‚“ãªæ¯’ã§ã‚‚ã€€æ²»ã—ã¦ãã‚Œã‚‹ã‚“ã ããƒ¼ã€‚ ã€€ã†ã„ãƒ¼ã£ã€€ãƒ’ãƒƒã‚¯ã€‚ãŠæœˆæ§˜ã«ã€€ã‹ã‚“ã±ãƒ¼ã„ï¼

135993.en:
If the rumors of the moon's fall are true, we will risk our lives to get water and food outside the village.
Even if we don't get hurt or sick, we will never escape hunger and thirst. We must at least try to save a little
at a time.

135994.en:
If your determination to reach Utopia is true, then you must open the way to Dark Vale, which has been closed to
you for so long. The key that closes the door to Utopia is sealed in the Nadraga Shrine to prevent disaster
from befalling our village. Go through the basement of the village.

135995.en:
I got a message for you from Sajay. He says he'll be waiting for you down the road. Underground in the village means
you're going to Dark Vale. How can you go to such a horrible place, even to restore the moon?
135995.ja:

The other day, some funny guys from Astor Teiya came and sat in my store. By the way, you look pale Priest. It
seems suspicious. Didn't they drop the moon?

135998.en:
Hey, is it true that Sajay went to Dark Vale? That place has been off- limits for years, and now she of all
people. You're helping Sajay, aren't you? Please, just go with her. Dark Vale can be reached from the basement
of the village.

135999.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>It seems that the moon has really
fallen. It's the end of Carlamora
Village. Everyone is slowly dying.

136000.en:
I can't believe the moon fell. You
must have had a bad dream. Why don't
you go rest in our bed? Well...<bw_break>

136001.en:
You're a little late. Sajay was waiting for me here, but he got impatient and went ahead. The chief
told me about you. The road ahead leads to Dark Vale. Go after Sajay as soon as you can. If the moon doesn't
return to normal, this village will be finished. Sooner or later, the poison will destroy it. You are our only
hope. Do your best.

136003.en:
Sajay's already gone. The road ahead leads to Dark Vale, so get after him as soon as you can. If the moon
doesn't return to normal, this village will be finished. Sooner or later, the poison will destroy it all. You are
our only hope. Do your best.

136004.en:
You went to Dark Vale, didn't you! How is Sajay? Was he distraught or crying? Well, if there's no change, it's fine.
Take good care of him, will you?

136005.en:
If you are ? Rest assured that Maille and the rest of the villagers are in good health. I see
that you have finally opened the door to Utopia and are aiming for the top of the Dark Realm. Please be careful.

136006.en:
You have successfully received the key to Utopia. Now it's time to go to Utopia, which is located at the top of
the mountain, through the door west of the village. But be warned. There is an old saying in this village. Utopia
is inhabited by demons.

136007.en:
Hey, how was Dark Vale? I was scared.
I've never been there.

136008.en:
Sajay went out again right after he came back from Dark Vale. I'm glad he's okay, though. What? Sajay's
destination? To the west of the village, to the rock pit. He said he was going to the door to Utopia.

136009.en: The door is locked from the inside.

136010.en:
Hey, how's it going? Have you figured out how to put the moon back in? If the moon doesn't return to normal,
this village will be finished. Sooner or later, the poison will destroy us all. You guys are our only hope.
136010.ja:

136011.en:
When I heard that Sajay was going to Dark Vale, I was a bit nervous, but I'm glad he's back safe and sound. I
hope this will help you to get your mind off things a little.

136012.en:
The key sealed in the Nadraga Shrine opened the door to Utopia? I see, it really was that key. Then I will no
longer be lost. , go with Sajay to Utopia and confirm everything with your own eyes!

136013.en:
Oh? Didn't you and Sajay go to the
West Hole? You know, that door called
door to Utopia.

136014.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Hey, why do you always, always, always
come back? Where's Sajay? Is he okay?

136015.en:
What? The demons of Utopia have appeared! You defeated them, and Sajay stayed behind to repair the moon. I
thank you for protecting him, but it's not right that you left him here alone. Now go find some kind of ore.
Go find some kind of ore!

136016.en:
I thank you for protecting Sajay from the demons. But it's not right that you left him here alone. Now go find
some kind of mine. Go find some kind of ore!

136017.en:
Oh, you came back from Utopia! And
what happened to the moon?

136018.en:
What a surprise, after all, there is a DEMON in Utopia. Glad to hear you guys are okay . Hard to
believe the moon was a piece of machinery, but if there's any chance of fixing it, that's good news. Find
that Sulphubal Ore or whatever it's called. The lives of everyone in the Dark Realm depend on you and Sajay.
I'm counting on you.

136019.en:
Hard to believe the moon was a piece of machinery, but if there's any hope of fixing it, that's good news. Find
this Sulphubal Ore. The lives of everyone in the Dark Realm depend on you and Sajay. I'm counting on you.

136020.en:
Well, you're back from Utopia! So did you find the moon? When will it shine again? You tell me! What? To fix the
moon, we need the Sulphubal Ore that was in the Ogreed Continent a long time ago? I don't know what it is, but
you're going to look for that Sulphubal Ore, aren't you? Good luck for our sake!

136021.en:
<pc> told Chief Kairam what
happened at Utopia!

136022.en:
The chiefs are taking care of everyone in Moonlit Hall right now. If you are here to visit your daughter, come on
in.

136023.en:
You keep coming back to the village,
but what happened to Sajay's bowls?
Take good care of him, will you?

136024.en:
Oh, um. My brother is taking care of everyone at Moonlit Hall now. That's why I'm on duty. I can't have anyone
in the house right now. I'm sorry.

136025.en:
A beautiful sister named Estella was
kind enough to encourage me. Hehehe,
the pain is gone!

136026.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Hehehe Estella gave me candy! But I
won't give it to strangers.

136027.en:
No, I'm sure they won't give it to me.
I'm sure he won't give it to me.
Because you look like a cheapskate.

136029.en:
Oh? You're Sajay's companion. You're looking for the chief? Moonlit Hall, then. Since the moon fell, chief has
been going to Moonlit Hall frequently to check on the poisoned.

136030.en: <attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>Hey Puluka, can he have a snack too?

136031.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>What's the matter? If you won't make
me a snack, go away!

136032.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr><turn_pc>Kechinbo, kechinbo! If you won't give
me a snack, go away!

136033.en:
That Estella is a kind girl. She was trying her best to cheer up the weak people in the village. It seems that
she hardly rests from her work at Moonlit Hall, tending to everyone.

136036.en:
Are you looking for a technique to refine Sulphubal Ore or something like that? Yes, I'm looking for a technique
to refine Sulphubal Ore or something like that. Chief might know. He is the most knowledgeable person in the
village. If the chief doesn't know, no one else will. Oh, well. He's in Moonlit Hall.

136037.en:
He told me that Derrida would take care of Sajay for him if anything happened to her. It was just the two
of them, brother and sister, with no one to take care of them. Derrida was a beautiful girl. Sober, but strong.
Hmm. Not for you to talk about, stranger. Forget about it.

136038.en:
Are you ? This room is guarded by a member of the Order, so please don't worry. But still, who are
those mysterious aliens? Not only did he try to kidnap Ms. Maille, but he is now trying to cast a spell on you as
well.

136039.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>Moonlit Hall is guarded by the Nadraga
cult, so what the hell happened
inside?

136040.en:
Ancient writings tell us that the Dark Realm was once home to a monster called the Demon Beast Sulphubal.
Sulphubal feeds on the energies of living creatures, transforming the energy it stores into ore that
promotes the growth of all things. Our ancestors hunted Sulphubal and refined Sulphubal Ore, the core of the
hexenbiest, for their daily lives. But at some point, the Sulphubal disappeared. Perhaps it left the
poisoned and skinny Dark Realm behind and traveled to a different world, a world more full of life.
. Maybe that's where you got your Sulphubal Ore. Oops, that was unnecessary. Now, take that
Sulphubalin to Sajay waiting for you in Utopia. Me? I'll be waiting here. I'm too old to chase dreams, even if
Utopia is real.

136041.en:
Sajay had a sweet girl named Derrida. She was going to marry my brother. When I think of Derrida, I get sad
too, so I think Sajay will be even sadder.

136042.en:
You're going to run an errand for the chief to deliver this Sulphubalin to Sajay, aren't you? Sajay left the
village for Utopia, right? I wonder if she's okay by herself.

136043.en:
This house used to be home to Derrida and her brother Sajay, but five years ago Derrida was poisoned by Dark Vale
and never lived there again. Sajay left the house to us and moved out, as if he was unhappy to live in a house
filled with his sister's memories.

136044.en:
I thought Moonlit Hall was making a lot of noise, but it was flooded with tremendous light. What in the world is
going on there?

136045.en: The door is locked from the inside.

136046.en:
What do you think? How is the alchemy lab that CHIEF is so proud of? It is quite a thing, even though it has not
been used for many years, isn't it? I know it's a time like this, but ever since the moon went down, Kairam has
been strangely lively. It's been decades since I've seen him looking so energetic. Hmmm... the old days were
not so bad.
136046.ja:
ã€Œã©ã†ã˜ã‚ƒï¼Ÿã€€æ‘é•·è‡ªæ…¢ã®ã€€éŒ¬é‡‘å·¥æˆ¿ã¯ã€‚ ã€€é•·å¹´ã€€ä½¿ã£ã¦ã„ãªã‹ã£ãŸã¨ã¯ã„ãˆ ã€€ãªã‹ãªã‹ã®ã€€ã‚‚ã®ã˜ã‚ƒã£ãŸã‚ã†ã€‚

136047.en:
<pipipi_mid>Archpriest Nadaia is currently
investigating Moonlit Hall. Please
leave us.

136049.en:
What, the moon has returned to normal? Don't be silly. The moon has been shining there for a long time. Look,
there on the ceiling, it's shining brightly! It's gotten kind of small, though. Hiccup.

136050.en:
The people of the Nadraga cult left food and water for us in the village. Now we will be able to survive for a
while.

136051.en:
Moonlit Hall is off limits. Some overbearing young guy named Tobias ordered that no one is allowed in
there.

136052.en:
Thanks to you, , the light of the moon has been restored and the villagers are all well. Thanks
to you, the moonlight has been restored and the villagers are all well again. But what happened to
Sajay? He ran away while I was talking to that Maille girl. Will you go and see what's going on?

136053.en:
I heard the moon was restored! Thanks to you and Sajay. Thank you, thank you, thank you! All right, we should
celebrate! We're giving away free drinks to priests and regulars from Astor Teiya or whatever it's called!

136054.en:
The Nadraga cultists are so arrogant and cool. Except for Estella's sister. Estella's sister is like a flower
blooming in a poisonous swamp. It's heartwarming to see her.

136055.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>Sajay is so bad. If I didn't say good-
bye and went away, I'd be called a bad
boy.

136056.en:
Yes. You look weird, but you're pretty
good at it. If you give me a snack,
I'll play with you.

136057.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>I won't play with you unless you give
me two. Hey!

136058.en:
What is wrong with Sajay, running off in the middle of a conversation with Mr. Maille? Sajay must have gone
toward Moonlit Hall. Hey, honey. Would you go check on Sajay?

136059.en: Hey, hey Puluka. This guy is...

136060.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Hey. Ah, I looked this way! What is
it? Which way do you want a snack?

136061.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr><turn_pc>If you give us both a snack, you can
play with them. Hey!

136062.en:
The sky is covered with rocks and this realm is closed, but strangely enough, outside of the village, the Zoomstone
is available. If, as Sajay says, we can find a way to live without moonlight, the Dark Realm may flourish
again. And people will travel back and forth between the villages and towns that have sprung up here and there
using Zoomstone. Such a day may come.

136063.en:
Sajay and you are both amazing! I thought there was no way you could bring the moon back to the Dark Realm!
You seem to know a lot of bigwigs. Looks can be deceiving. I'm really, really, really afraid of you!
136063.ja:
ã€Œã‚µã‚¸ã‚§ã‚‚ã€€ã‚ã‚“ãŸã‚‚ã€€ã™ã”ã„ãªï¼ ã€€æœˆã‚’ã€€é—‡ã®é ˜ç•Œã«ã€€å–ã‚Šæˆ»ã™ã“ã¨ãªã‚“ã¦ ã€€ã§ãã£ã“ãªã„ã¨æ€ã£ã¦ãŸã‚ˆï¼
ã€Œãªã‚“ã ã‹ã€€ãŠå‰ã„ã•ã‚“ã¨ã‚‚ã€€çŸ¥ã‚Šåˆã„ã¿ãŸã„ã ã— ã€€äººã¯ã€€è¦‹ã‹ã‘ã«ã‚ˆã‚‰ãªã„ãªã€‚ ã€€ã„ã‚„ã¯ã‚„ã€€ã¾ã£ãŸãã€€ãŠãã‚Œã„ã£ãŸã‚ˆï¼

136064.en: The door is locked from the inside.

136066.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Let us thank Nadraga for restoring
that moon, the pure light that heals
all. Now<bw_break>

136067.en:
Well, well, well! I am so happy to hear that our great benefactor , who brought back the
moon, is staying at our inn. Well...

136068.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>By the way, both you and Sajay have
been to such a horrible place as Dark
Vale. I have a lot of respect for you.

136069.en:
A future where we don't need to depend on the moon. If Sajay and everyone in the village work together, we may be
able to make it happen.

136070.en:
This is the Moonlit Hall. All poisons
will be dissipated by the light of the
moon shining in this holy dustbowl.

136071.en:
The moon has risen and the villagers are saved. The Dark Realm is safe for now. You and Sajay are the village's
benefactors. You're a master.I look forward to seeing you again someday in the purity of this
village.

136072.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Can I play with Sajay from now on?
What should I do?

136073.en:
Estella is on her way to Utopia on a mission for the Nadraga cult. She's going to investigate the tower. She
really is a hard worker, working so hard in this village and then immediately going on to the next
mission. Oh, my! Are you going to the tower too? I was hoping to relax in this village, but I have no choice!
136073.ja:

136074.en:
Well, it's good to see you looking so well. You are more than welcome to . You are always welcome
to visit Carlamora Village.

139185.en:
From there, it leads out of the village to a place called Dark Vale. But it is now off-limits by chief's
order. There have been many villagers who have lost their lives in the Dark Vale. You should stay away from there,
too.

139186.en:
Traveler. From there, you can go out of the village to a place called Dark Vale. But for now, it's off-limits by
chief's order. There have been many villagers who have lost their lives in the Dark Vale. You should stay away
from there, too.

140989.en:
Kairam, the chief, is not here. He
said he was going to check on Moonlit
Hall. If you need him, he's there.

143248.en:
Why is it that no one makes a fuss when they see someone fall ill from poisoning? That's because it happens
all the time. This area is full of poisonous plants with poisonous spores and poisonous swamps. Everyone is
exposed to poison in their normal lives. If you are in mortal agony, just run to Moonlit Hall. As long as
you have the moon, you have nothing to worry about.
143248.ja:

143249.en:
There seems to be some kind of special
equipment hidden there.

143250.en:
Hey, what's that racket you were making?What? You're kidding, right? I can't believe the moon fell. Please
don't make jokes! It's because of the moonlight that we've been able to live in this poisoned land. But if the moon
disappears... What is this? How can things turn out like this? Damn it!
143250.ja:
ã€ŒãŠã„â€¦â€¦ãªã‚“ã ã‚ˆã€€ã•ã£ãã®é¨’ãã¯ï¼Ÿ ã€€â€¦â€¦ã¯ï¼Ÿã€€ã‚¦ã‚½ã ã‚ï¼Ÿã€€æœˆãŒã€€è½ã¡ãŸã ãªã‚“ã¦ã€‚ ã€€æ‚ªã„å†—è«‡ã¯ã€€ã‚„ã‚ã¦ãã‚Œï¼

ã€Œãªã‚“ãªã‚“ã ã‚ˆï¼ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã©ã†ã—ã¦ã€€ã“ã‚“ãªã“ã¨ã«ã€€ãªã‚‹ã‚“ã ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€ããã£ï¼ï¼

143251.en:
I heard. I heard you guys are trying to restore the moon for the village. I'm sorry. I'm sorry for causing you
trouble. I wish I could help you, but now that the moon is gone, I'm afraid to even step out of the village gate.
You guys be careful. If you are exposed to strong poison outside the village again, there is no way to
survive.
143251.ja:
ã€Œèã„ãŸã‚ˆã€‚ã‚ã‚“ãŸãŸã¡ã€€æ‘ã®ãŸã‚ã« ã€€æœˆã‚’ã€€å…ƒã«æˆ»ãã†ã¨ã—ã¦ãã‚Œã¦ã‚‹ã‚“ã ã£ã¦ãªã€‚ ã€€â€¦â€¦ã™ã¾ã‚“ãªã€‚è¿·æƒ‘ã‚’ã€€ã‹ã‘ã¡ã¾ã£ã¦ã€‚

143252.en:
<feel_sad_one>Hey, look. You keep coming back to the
village, but don't tell me Sajay's
long gone.<bw_break>

143253.en:
<feel_happy_lv2>What? Are you okay? And you found the
moon? You guys are amazing! This gives
me hope for life!

143254.en:
Hey, look. Hey, there was some suspicious smoke coming out of the Chief's house earlier. No? Did the
chief make a medicine to fix the moon? Wow, the chief is pretty good at it too.

143255.en:
All right! I'll get my courage up and fly out of the village, too. I'll try to get the stuff for the mailbox when
the moon is fixed.

143256.en:
All this time I thought the moonlight would never go away, but this is a wake-up call. Like Sajay said, we need
to find a way to live without moonlight.

143257.en:
We did it! We did it! The moon is fixed and I got the stuff that flew out of the village! I owe it all to
you and Sajay. What? Where did Sajay go? He ran toward Moonlit Hall.

143258.en:
Did that Maille girl look like Derrida? Don't be silly, Derrida is much more beautiful. She's much more
beautiful than that Estella.

143259.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>I wonder how he could work with that
difficult Sajay. I wouldn't last five
minutes.

143276.en:
You must be the traveler Sajay brought. She's not a bad girl, even if she's not very sociable. She's just a
little awkward because of everything that's happened.

143277.en:
Hey, is it true that the moon has fallen? I haven't been healed from the poison yet. What am I supposed to do
when there is no doctor in the village?

143278.en:
Just now, the Nadraga cultists were running toward Moonlit Hall. I wonder if something troublesome happened
again.

143584.en:
There is an alchemy lab that purifies
Sulphubal Ore.

146939.en:
Hmm. What, you're you? You're selling oil in a place like this? You were on an important trip. Hey, have you met
Sajay yet? He's strangely put on airs about being the hero who saved the village. I understand he's a little
upset because the anniversary of Derrida's death is coming up, but that's okay. I'll ask him myself. I
don't know why Sajay has taken to such a drifter.
146939.ja:
ã€Œãµã‚“ã€‚ãªã‚“ã ã€€ã‚ã‚“ãŸã‹ã€‚ ã€€ã“ã‚“ãªæ‰€ã§ã€€æ²¹ã‚’å£²ã£ã¦ã¦ã€€ã„ã„ã®ã‹ã‚ˆï¼Ÿ ã€€å¤§äº‹ãªæ—…ã®é€”ä¸­ã ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã‚ã€‚

146940.en:
Listen, I have a secret story to tell you. Baju, please speak in a quiet voice so that your brother can't hear
you, okay?

146941.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>Your handshake is too big! Then my
brother will hear. Please. Please
speak in a quiet voice.

146942.en:
Thanks! Let's have a secret talk together. Let's talk about something we both know nothing about. I got your
name from Sajay. You know what? Sajay seems a little sad even though the moon is fixed. That's why big brother
Baju looks worried too. I'm worried about you two. I want them to get better! So I'm going to give Sajay and
Baju a secret present. is a friend of both of them and a very reliable person, isn't he? I need your
help to give them a present!
146942.ja:
ã€Œã‚ã‚ŠãŒã¨â€¦â€¦ï¼ ã€€ãµãŸã‚Šã§ã€€ãƒŠã‚¤ã‚·ãƒ§è©±ã€€ã—ã‚ˆã†ã­ã€‚

146943.en:
Thank you! After all, is a kind person as Sajay said. I'll start with Sajay's. Sajay lost his
notebook the other day. Sajay lost his notebook the other day, and he's in trouble. But I can't buy a new one
with my allowance. That notebook is very important to her. So I think it would be a joy to find Sajay's
notebook and give it to him as a present! Sajay said he lost his notebook at Utopia. She said it was
taken by a fuzzy yellow monster. I know it's scary to fight the monster, but I want you to go to Utopia, defeat
the yellow fuzzy monster, and get the Leather Notebook! I'm begging you! If you find it, bring it to me.
Please!
146943.ja:

on my own. <pc> See you
later.

146946.en:
Oh <pc>! Are you going to
help me with a present for Sajay and
big brother Baju?

146947.en:
Sajay is. Sajay lost his notebook when he went to Utopia the other day and is in trouble. The yellow fuzzy monster
took it.

146948.en:
I know it's scary to fight monsters, but I need you to go to Utopia, defeat the yellow fuzzy thing, and get me the
Leather Notebook! I'm begging you! If you find it, bring it to me. Please!

146949.en:
Welcome back <pc>. Have you
found the Leather Notebook that Sajay
lost yet?

146950.en:
I see you haven't done it yet. I'll be waiting for you here, so go get your Leather Notebook at Utopia!
.

146951.en:
Oh this! Wow, wow, wow ! This is the Leather Notebook that Sajay lost! Thank you .
Now then, let's put the secret letter I wrote in it together. Done!Present for Sajay is completed!
. Please don't tell Sajay that this present is from me, but I want you to deliver it to him.

when I deliver it to him! She'll be at
Moonlit Hall, so please do me a favor.

<pc> received Present for
Sajay (Key Item) from Mirta!<me 60>

146955.en:
You're sneaking around, standing on
someone's doorstep. I hope you're not
doing something nefarious.

146956.en:
I put together the Leather Notebook that found for me and my secret letter and made it Present for
Sajay.

146958.en:
Inside the cute wrapping paper is a
letter from Mirta and a Leather
Notebook Rappiing.

146959.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Ah <pc>. Welcome back. Sajay,
did you enjoy it?

146960.en:
Thank goodness. It went well! Now I'd like to ask you to give Baju a secret present. There is a beautiful flower
called Dusk Flower that blooms only in Dark Vale, and I want to give it to my brother! According to Chief's story,
it's in the lower level of Dark Vale. It grows at the end of the passage that connects the north and south
sides of Dark Vale. But you can't find the Dusk Flower in any ordinary year. That's because the flowers don't open
unless we shine a light on them! Maybe. So, if you find a vase, light a torch, and when it blooms, it's the
Dusk Flower! If you don't have a Torch, you can get one by going to Dark Vale and looking up the first
Flame Pedestal! I've already written a letter to you, so please give the Dusk Flower to your brother Baju along with
your letter!

146961.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr><pc>. For Sajay and your
brother, please! Have a safe trip!

146965.en:
<pc> informed Mirta that
Sajay was grateful!

146966.en:
<pc> received Letter to
Brother (Key Item) from Mirta!<me 60>

146981.en:
spanned the Letter to Brother. The lovely sealed tube was addressed to her favorite brother,
Baju.

146983.en:
What the hell are you up to? How many
times have you stood on the sly in
other people's houses?

146984.en:
<pc> Wow, wow, wow! Dusk
Flower is really beautiful.<open_irai><bw_break>

146985.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>That flower was my dead sister
Derrida's favorite. Give it to your
brother along with my letter!

146986.en:
I'm sorry. My brother made fun of me. I did something bad to Sajay, too. Sajay and his brother are
getting along fine on their own, and I shouldn't have done that. But I'm glad that Sajay and his brother are going
to visit the tomb together. . Thank you.

147049.en:
There is a beautiful flower called
Dusk Flower that only blooms in Dark
Vale, and I want to give it to you!<open_irai><bw_break>

147050.en:
According to Chief's story, it seems to be growing at the end of the passage that connects the north and
south in the lower level of Dark Vale. It seems to grow at the end of the passage that connects the north and
south sides of the Dark Vale. If you find a Dusk Flower vase, light a torch and shine a light on it. If it blooms,
it must be Dusk Flower! If you don't have a Torch, go to the first Flame Pedestal in the Dark Vale to get one!

147051.en:
When you find the Dusk Flower, give it to your brother along with the Letter to Brother! Well then, have a safe
trip!

147052.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Listen up. This house is not a tavern
or an inn. If you have no use for it,
get the hell out.

147053.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Is this the Dusk Flower? Why are you
doing this? And this letter?

147055.en:
Ah-ha-ha! I want them to make up! Sajay has a cute side, doesn't he? And his rounded handwriting on this pink
bottle. It's so cute that it bears no resemblance to Sajay's usual handwriting. You know...

147056.en:
My sister Mirta is a good and kind girl. I know she cares about me and Sajay, but it's kunai to cheat people,
and it's even kunaier to make you, a stranger, participate in your own lies. But it's kunai to cheat people,
and it's even more kunai to make you, a stranger, a part of your lie, isn't it?
147056.ja:

147057.en:
I don't mind that Sajay is behaving like that. On the contrary, it makes me happy. Sajay, who acts like an
adult and tries to handle everything by himself, rebels against me like a child. If I really disliked him, I
would have kept him at a distance so as not to make things worse. In other words, he is taking advantage of me.
However, from what I read in the real Sajay's letter, it seems that he has finally grown up. I received a letter
from the real Sajay just now. On the anniversary of Derrida's death this year, he said we should pick Dusk
Flower and go to the tomb together. Hmm. I was going to invite her first, but I didn't think she'd beat me to
it. See you later. You nosy . Thanks for your help this time. I wish you a safe trip.

Would you like to give Dusk Flower and

147060.en:
<pc> gave Dusk Flower and
Letter to Brother to Baju!

147062.en: Baju gave Mirta a stern lecture.

147063.en:
I'm sorry . My sister caused me a lot of trouble. Sajay wrote in his letter that on the
anniversary of Derrida's death this year, we should pick lots of Dusk Flowers, which she loved, and go to
the tomb together. I was going to ask her to go with me, but I didn't think she would beat me to it. So Sajay is
no longer a child. Every year as the day of Derrida's death approached, I felt heavy, but this year, I can't
wait for her death anniversary to come. See you soon. Thanks for your help, . Thanks for your
help this time. I wish you a safe trip.

147064.en:
I'm sorry. My brother made fun of me. I did something bad to Sajay too. I should thank
for helping me. I want you to receive this.

147065.en:
Sajay and his brother are getting along fine on their own, and I'm just too much of a jerk. But I'm glad that
Sajay and his brother are going to visit the tomb together. . Thank you.

147073.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Don't tell anyone that it's from me,
but please deliver the present. Sajay
is at Moonlit Hall!

150207.en:
. You've come to the right place. I am sorry, but I must ask you to do me a favor. I have a
letter to deliver to a certain person, but it is too dangerous to entrust it to an ordinary man. You are my only
hope. Will you do me a favor?

150208.en:
Oh, you can do it! That's for you. I'm in your debt. Now, the person to whom I want
you to deliver this letter is the one who knows everything about the Dark Realm, the one who lies in the depths
of darkness. In order to enter the Dark Realm, you must perform a certain ritual. First, I will give you this
Dark Crystal to use in the ritual.

Psyche up magic power to Dark Crystal for the ritual. Once you have defeated <%sev_que_name0> in Dark Edge,
<%nev_que_t_num0>, you should have enough magic power to complete the ritual. Once you have enough magic,
come back to me and I'll tell you what you need to do next. Then, please do as I ask.

<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I see. But I don't think I can ask
anyone else to do this. If you change
your mind, come back again.

150213.en:
In order to enter the place of the one who lies in the depths of darkness, you must perform a ritual using the
Dark Crystal that I just gave you.

150214.en:
First, you must Psyche Up the magic to Dark Crystal. You can get as much as you need by defeating <%sev_que_name0>
<%nev_que_t_num0> in Dark Edge. Once you have enough magic power, come back to me and I will tell you what to do
next. Then, please do as I ask.

150217.en:
<pc>. How's it going? Has the
Dark Crystal accumulated any magic?<yesno><break>

150218.en:
Well, when the crystal has enough
magic power, come back to me. Then,
I'm counting on you.

150219.en:
Oh, it looks like you've built up enough magic power. Now let's move on to the next step. Let's leave the Dark
Crystal with you for now.

150220.en:
We will put the Dark Crystal in this state into the ampoule and wait for a while for the magic to amplify, but in
the meantime, please join me in a little of my old story.

150221.en:
Now, let me explain the final part of the ritual to meet the one who lies in the depths of darkness. After passing
through the Dark Vale, go to the Nadraga Shrine, and in front of the altar, scream in a voice that can be
heard by those around you, ''I aim to die. If you do so, the magical power stored in the Dark Crystal will be
released, and you should be able to visit those who lie dormant in the depths of darkness. Then I entrust
this letter to you. Then I entrust this letter to you. Make sure you deliver it to the one who lies dormant
in the depths of darkness. I'm counting on you.

150222.en:
gave the Dark Crystal to Chief Kairam. Chief Kairam put the Dark Crystal in a pot containing a
mysterious liquid.

150225.en:
Go through the Dark Vale to the Nadraga Shrine, and in front of the altar, scream in a voice that can be
heard by those around you, ''I aim for my life.

150226.en:
This will release the magic stored in the Dark Crystal and allow us to go to those who lie in the depths of
darkness. The way to Nadraga Shrine should be through the upper levels of the Dark Vale. It is a shorter route.
150226.ja:

150227.en:
Then, I'm counting on you. I trust that you will deliver that letter to the one who lies in the depths of
darkness.

150228.en:
Oh! Looks like you were able to meet that gentleman without incident. That's what I'd expect from
.

150229.en:
So the letter arrived in one piece?
Did he who lies in the depths of
darkness say anything?

150230.en:
That day, while I was preparing for my journey to Utopia after having succeeded in generating the key, a
vicious monster attacked the village. Many villagers fell, and my father, the former chief, was deeply wounded
and never returned home. On his deathbed, my father said to me, ''Son. Take care of Carlamora Village, my
son.After much deliberation between my dream and the mission entrusted to me, I abandoned my dream and chose my
mission as chief. The damaged village needed me. But on the other hand, there was another part of me that kept
blaming my choice on my resolve, my promise, and my escape from my dream.

150231.en:
You should be more proud of the path you've taken. He's right. If you look back on the path you have taken, you
have nothing to be ashamed of. I'm sorry for the trouble I've caused you. I'm sorry I asked you to go through
all this trouble. This is a thank-you. Please accept it.

150232.en:
I will continue to walk the path I have chosen. And I will aim for what lies ahead. Another Paradise created
by the Dragon Tribe.

150233.en:
<pc> returned Dark Crystal to
Chief Kairam and told him about God
Beast Pachatika.

150234.en:
I had always regretted the choice I made that day. But this time, I finally came to think that it was the
right thing to do. I will continue to walk the path I have chosen. And I will aim for what lies ahead. Another
Paradise created by the dragon tribe.
150234.ja:

150437.en:
After years of research, I arrived at the fact that Paradise Key was already lost and realized that I had to make
the key with my own hands. But to do so, I had no choice but to meet the One who lies in the depths of darkness
and ask for His wisdom. After much hardship, I have managed to arrange the ritual to meet Him. As soon as we
met, he who lies in the depths of darkness said to me, ''If you go to Utopia, you will be demonized. If you
go to Utopia, the demons will kill you. Do you really want the key? I said. Utopia is the only hope that
might save us from the poison. It's worth risking your life for. The one who lies in the depths of darkness
laughed a bit, and then told me how to make the key. With that knowledge, I studied and created the Paradise Key.

150438.en:
But I became afraid.I opened the door, and I knew that I would be killed by the demon, but that the demon's plague
would extend to the village. It could be assumed that I had become desperate for my life. As I told you before, I
could not pass through that door.

150439.en:
Chief Kairam took the Dark Crystal out
of the pot and handed it to
<pc> again.

150508.en:
<icon_exc>Well, it looks like the magic
amplification is done.

170951.en:
There is a moonlight that has healing power in this dark domain. I can't wait to bathe in it.
Hurry up.

170952.en:
Smyles, who had taken the liberty of
putting his face out from the embrace
of <pc>, spoke into my mind.

173926.en:
You want to go to Nadraga Shrine? I
heard it's at the far end of the Dark
Vale, just off that road. Be careful.

177859.en:
If you're going back to your hometown, tell that Maille girl to come visit Sajay once in a while. He liked her a
lot, after all. And . Take care of yourself too. Don't be too reckless.

177860.en:
What? God is dead? Don't be ridiculous! The god of this tavern is me! You know, they say from the old
days. The customer is God. Hiccup.
177860.ja:

177861.en:
A while ago, Sajay came to our house and I showed him your sister's diary. I told her to keep it, but she
refused, saying she didn't need it anymore. I wonder if she's gotten her mind in order.

177862.en:
Even if the light of the moon disappears or God disappears, it doesn't mean the end of the world is
coming. You and Sajay taught me that as long as I have the will to live, I can surely overcome any adversity.

177863.en:
Yo liberator-sama, ain't you? You're a big benefactor of Nadragand. You're always welcome to visit us! Well,
Estella told me that you used to work at Astor Teiya too. I bet you must be a great tavern.
177863.ja:

177864.en:
Hey, how's your sister Estella doing? Hey, how's your sister Estella doing? What? She moved to a far away place?
Oh, no. I was looking forward to the day Estella's sister would come to the village again. Now my life is all
bleak!

177865.en:
I heard from the Nadraga cultists that you beat up a big guy and saved Nadragand! I don't know what's what,
but it's amazing! I'm really, really, really amazed!

177866.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Pray here for the safety of your
journey and that the future that
awaits you will be a happy one. Now...<bw_break>

177867.en:
Just as we must find a future where we can live without the moon, the people of Nadragand must live in a godless
future. We must find a future where we can live without relying on the moon, just as the people of Nadragand must
live in a godless future where we must eventually be left alone by our loving parents. That is what it means to
live.

188643.en:
Oops? I see you are <pc>.
What can I do for you?

188644.en:
It's nice of you to come all the way out here to visit us, but there are many demons in various parts of the
country. Be careful.

188645.en:
Oh, I see! So, Tobias of the Nadragand cooperative asked you to deliver this for him! Thank you very much. Now we
won't have to worry about food for a while. I know Tobias isn't with you, but I'm glad you're here, because I've
never felt so reassured in my life. I'm sure you will be able to defeat the demons that have
appeared in the Dark Realm. First, you should hear more about it from Sajay, the man who discovered it. I believe
Sajay is in Moonlit Hall. Thank you.

188646.en:
Would you like to give Group Relief
Supplies to Chief Kairam?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

188647.en:
<pc> handed over Group Relief
Supplies to Chief Kairam!

188648.en:
I am sure that you will be able to defeat this demon that has appeared in the Dark Realm. First of
all, please ask Sajay, who discovered the demon, for more details. I believe Sajay is in Moonlit Hall. Thank you.

188649.en:
I see. The rampaging demon has headed for the Nadraga Shrine. I urge you to defeat him. I believe you
can save us from this crisis. I'm counting on you.

188650.en:
Oh? <pc> Were you not with
Mister Tobias? Go to Nadraga Shrine
again and check on him.

188651.en:
Welcome back. Tobias told me about you. You have defeated the demon. We can't be too careful
yet, but we can rest easy here for a while. I thank you from the bottom of my heart. Ah, Tobias-sama is heading
for the Ether Village in the Ice Realm with his daughter and accompanying soldiers. Actually, a messenger
arrived a few minutes ago. It seems that a demon has appeared there as well. They want to come
as soon as possible. Please go to Chief Nogrid's place in Ether Village for now.

188653.en:
We can't let our guard down yet, but thanks to 's defeat of the demon, we can rest easy here for a
while. I thank you from the bottom of my heart.

188654.en:
The demons that have been appearing in various places must have been possessed by something called demon
miasma. We must think of some countermeasures to prevent the birth of more demons.

188702.en:
It's terrible that winds like that are occurring in so many places. I wonder when the day will come when we can
live peacefully.

188703.en:
I hear that the demon miasma is gone, and that there is no longer any danger of the demon appearing. I've heard
that demon miasma is an immeasurable being, transforming even the most troublesome monster into such a
ferocious form.

196007.en:
What is it? Strange voices in the Nadraga Shrine? Could it be that you are being summoned by the One who lies
in the depths of darkness? If that's the case, head back to the Nadraga Shrine.
